title: List cards details
description: This action lists requested cards details for shopper profile. On invocation of this action, all saved cards (profileRepository.savedCards.<profileId>.savedCardsMap) and profile specific saved card ids (profileRepository.savedCards.<profileId>.profileSavedCardIds) will get replaced in application state.

allCards.description: This value is set to true, if inactive cards are also expected in the response.

allGateways.description: This value is set to true, if the cards from disabled gateways are also expected in the response.

allSites.description: This value is set to true, if the cards from non-current site are also expected in the response.
